      实现ElementConverter的org.xmappr.converters中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ClassConverter
      This is a default ElementConverter that tries to convert any Class based on injected mappers.
      class  CollectionConverter 
      class  DomElementConverter 
      class  ValueConverterWrapper
      Wraps ValueConverter so that it behaves like ElementConverter.
